```{r}
library(vegabrite)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(tidyr)
library(jsonlite)

ans <- function(x = "x1", y = "y1") {
base1 <- vl_chart() |>
  vl_add_data(anscombe) |>
  vl_encode_x(x) |>
  vl_encode_y(y)

points1 <- base1 |> vl_mark_point(size = 15, opacity = 0.3)

line1 <- base1 |> 
  vl_regression(x, on = y) |>
  vl_mark_line()

line1 + points1
}
ans("x2", "y2")
  

```
